name: Mismatched
description:
Mismatched is a single-player, splitscreen platformer set in heaven and hell simultaneously. 

The player must use the two characters' linked movement to overcome challenges to make it through a harrowing set of levels.

Controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMovementA/D keys, left/right arrow keysLeft thumbstickJumpW key, arrow up key, space barAReset Player & BoxesR keyYPauseEscape keyStartQuit to MenuT keySelect/Back

Credits:

Norbert van Hamond - Level design, Gameplay design
Billy Becker - Programming, Level Design, Gameplay Design
Nick Snoeren - Programming, Audio Design, Level Design, Gameplay Design
Isabelle van der Voorn - Character design & art
Teth Red - Environmental design & art

Additional Credits:

Additional sound effects from "http://www.zapsplat.com"
Additional 2D assets by Ansimuz, beamedeighth.
Xbox icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
Background music is "Allegro" from GameSounds.xyz
